title: {{W|QudUX}}
description:
QudUX improves the game's menus and adds subtle quality of life features.

• Automatically track
  visited locations in
  your journal

• Find village quest
  givers more easily

• Customize your sprite
  during character
  creation

• Enjoy revamped menus:
   • Cooking menu
   • Inventory
   • Build library

        And more...
author: egocarib
